00045 #ifndef _CONF_ISP_H_
00046 #define _CONF_ISP_H_
00047 
00048 #include <avr32/io.h>
00049 #include "compiler.h"
00050 
00051 
00052 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________________
00053 
00054 #define PRODUCT_MANUFACTURER_ID       0x58
00055 #define PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID             0x20
00056 
00057 #define ISP_VERSION                   0x00
00058 #define ISP_ID0                       0x00
00059 #define ISP_ID1                       0x00
00060 
00061 #define ISP_GPFB_FORCE                31
00062 #define ISP_GPFB_FORCE_MASK           0x80000000
00063 #define ISP_GPFB_FORCE_OFFSET         31
00064 #define ISP_GPFB_FORCE_SIZE           1
00065 
00066 #define ISP_GPFB_IO_COND_EN           30
00067 #define ISP_GPFB_IO_COND_EN_MASK      0x40000000
00068 #define ISP_GPFB_IO_COND_EN_OFFSET    30
00069 #define ISP_GPFB_IO_COND_EN_SIZE      1
00070 
00071 #define ISP_GPFB_BOD_EN               29
00072 #define ISP_GPFB_BOD_EN_MASK          0x20000000
00073 #define ISP_GPFB_BOD_EN_OFFSET        29
00074 #define ISP_GPFB_BOD_EN_SIZE          1
00075 
00076 #define ISP_CFG                       (*(volatile U32 *)ISP_CFG_ADDRESS)
00077 #define ISP_CFG_ADDRESS               (AVR32_FLASHC_USER_PAGE_ADDRESS + ISP_CFG_OFFSET)
00078 #define ISP_CFG_OFFSET                0x000001FC
00079 #define ISP_CFG_SIZE                  4
00080 
00081 #define ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY              17
00082 #define ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_MASK         0xFFFE0000
00083 #define ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_OFFSET       17
00084 #define ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_SIZE         15
00085 #define ISP_CFG_BOOT_KEY_VALUE        0x494F
00086 
00087 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL         16
00088 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL_MASK    0x00010000
00089 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL_OFFSET  16
00090 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_LEVEL_SIZE    1
00091 
00092 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN           8
00093 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN_MASK      0x0000FF00
00094 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN_OFFSET    8
00095 #define ISP_CFG_IO_COND_PIN_SIZE      8
00096 
00097 #define ISP_CFG_CRC8                  0
00098 #define ISP_CFG_CRC8_MASK             0x000000FF
00099 #define ISP_CFG_CRC8_OFFSET           0
00100 #define ISP_CFG_CRC8_SIZE             8
00101 #define ISP_CFG_CRC8_POLYNOMIAL       0x107
00102 
00103 #define ISP_KEY                       (*(volatile U32 *)ISP_KEY_ADDRESS)
00104 #define ISP_KEY_ADDRESS               (AVR32_SRAM_ADDRESS + ISP_KEY_OFFSET)
00105 #define ISP_KEY_OFFSET                0x00000000
00106 #define ISP_KEY_SIZE                  4
00107 #define ISP_KEY_VALUE                 ('I' << 24 | 'S' << 16 | 'P' << 8 | 'K')
00108 
00109 #ifndef ISP_OSC
00110   #define ISP_OSC                     0
00111 #endif

00113 #define DFU_FRAME_LENGTH              2048
00114

00116 #define PROGRAM_START_OFFSET          0x00002000
